quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Tosa-class battleship number one – Tosa.

quotes.name: Details
quotes.quote: I am Tosa, the first Tosa-class battleship. My construction began long ago, but its completion never came... I have been an aircraft carrier, a battleship, a weapons testbed, and a target; they worked and reworked me to the bone. But now I am here, in this form, and I will not disappoint you.

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: I am the nameship of the Tosa-class battleships, Tosa. I only serve those who I deem worthy. As for you... Well, I do not believe in making hasty judgments. For the time being, let me first assess your abilities.

quotes.name: Log in
quotes.quote: Give me an engaging task, should you find one, Commander.

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: I hate the phrase, "it's how it's always been done." The same mistakes will forever be repeated as long as fools keep spouting it.

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: Brute force – the most primitive, but also most effective approach. That said, I much prefer fighting with words over swords.

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: I do not shy away from using any trick required to achieve my goals. I would rather that than play by the rules and end up at the bottom of the sea.

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: Stay behind if you cannot fight. The weak should know their place from the strong – this is the belief my sister holds.

quotes.name: Main screen 4
quotes.quote: I am neither as forward-thinking as Amagi, nor as short-fused as my sister. What? What's incorrect? The part about my sister, or my description of myself?

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: Seeing as you have time to kill, why not practice your swordplay with me?

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: Acting on a momentary impulse can have deadly repercussions. I do hope you're not getting any outlandish ideas.

quotes.name: Mission reminder
quotes.quote: A leader chooses their mission, not the other way around. You should take this principle to heart, Commander.

quotes.name: Mission complete
quotes.quote: A mission has been completed, has it? Then don't loiter around, go and claim the rewards at once.

quotes.name: Mail reminder
quotes.quote: A letter, eh? I would be grateful if even a third of the information in it is credible.

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: Did you see anything extraordinary on your expedition? You may find it inconsequential, but I am curious to know what you encountered.

quotes.name: Commission complete
quotes.quote: You don't expect me to announce when a commission team returns, do you?

quotes.name: Enhancing complete
quotes.quote: You have an eye for talent, Commander.

quotes.name: Flagship fight
quotes.quote: Hah, my rampage is soon to begin!

quotes.name: Victory
quotes.quote: It's over already? Hmph, I expected more from them.

quotes.name: Defeat
quotes.quote: Gah, so even I overestimate my abilities at times...

quotes.name: Skills
quotes.quote: Bear witness to who reigns supreme!

quotes.name: Low HP
quotes.quote: Hahaha... Battles fraught with suspense are always the most interesting!

quotes.name: Upset
quotes.quote: Weaklings belong behind the shorelines. I have no business with someone who cannot handle even a tidal wave.

quotes.name: Stranger
quotes.quote: You are brave, lowering your guard around someone that could take your life at any moment. You say it's because you trust me? Hahahah. Trust. A fine word that is.

quotes.name: Friendly
quotes.quote: You are an odd one, remaining unfazed in the presence of the Sakura Empire's ships. Still, I do enjoy exchanging stories with you. What have you in store for me today?

quotes.name: Crush
quotes.quote: When I am alone, I let no rules or regulations restrain me; I push my will through. However, when you are present, I feel compelled to follow the rules and act with prudence. You are really something else, Commander.

quotes.name: Love
quotes.quote: Your ambitions and dreams are of no concern to me, but I know that you need me. Which, I admit, is also true in reverse. Our fates are intertwined, and we cannot afford to lose one another... Hahahah, isn't that right?

quotes.name: Promise
quotes.quote: Simply being given life in this world would've been enough for me, but now I've even been given a partner to spend said life with... Hmph, life is a long and arduous road, and I am happy that I get to walk it with you.

quotes.name: Battle 1
quotes.quote: (1 of the following: IJN Kaga) Together with me now, my sister!

quotes.name: Battle 2
quotes.quote: (1 of the following: IJN Amagi) I am still no match for you, Amagi.

quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: An inspection? ...You're awfully gung-ho about your work considering how hot it is outside... Surely you wouldn't have some sort of ulterior motive?
